languages.text: {n}Блюстительница Стальной госпожи — символ порядка и послушания в отсеке. Она... мешает. Когда она исчезнет, мои враги подумают, что им предоставился шанс... Ошибка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Блюстительница Стальной госпожи — символ порядка и послушания в отсеке. Она... мешает. Когда она исчезнет, мои враги подумают, что им предоставился шанс... Ошибка.{/n}

languages.text: {n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Блюстительница Стальной госпожи — символ порядка и послушания в отсеке. Она... мешает. Когда она исчезнет, мои враги подумают, что им предоставился шанс... Ошибка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The enforcer of Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in the compartment. She is… standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will think it would be safe to strike… A costly mistake.{/n}

{n}The enforcer of Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in the compartment. She is… standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will think it would be safe to strike… A costly mistake.{/n}

{n}The enforcer of Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in the compartment. She is… standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike… and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

{n}The enforcer of Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in the compartment. She is… standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike… and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

{n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

{n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Diese Enforcerin, die der Stahlherrin untersteht, ist das Symbol der Ordnung und des Gehorsams in diesen Kammern. Sie ... steht im Weg. Wenn sie verschwindet, werden meine Feinde glauben, sie könnten ungefährdet zuschlagen ... und das wird ein teurer Fehler sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Diese Enforcerin, die der Stahlherrin untersteht, ist das Symbol der Ordnung und des Gehorsams in diesen Kammern. Sie ... steht im Weg. Wenn sie verschwindet, werden meine Feinde glauben, sie könnten ungefährdet zuschlagen ... und das wird ein teurer Fehler sein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esta guardia que responde ante Señora de Acero es el símbolo del orden y la obediencia en estas cámaras. Está... entorpeciendo el camino. Cuando desaparezca, mis enemigos creerán que es seguro atacar... y pagarán muy caro ese error.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esta guardia que responde ante Señora de Acero es el símbolo del orden y la obediencia en estas cámaras. Está... entorpeciendo el camino. Cuando desaparezca, mis enemigos creerán que es seguro atacar... y pagarán muy caro ese error.{/n}

languages.text: {n}鉄の淑女に呼応するエンフォーサーは、この部屋における秩序と服従の象徴だ。彼女が…邪魔だ。彼女が消えれば、私の敵は攻撃しても大丈夫だと思うだろう…それは大きな間違いなのだが。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鉄の淑女に呼応するエンフォーサーは、この部屋における秩序と服従の象徴だ。彼女が…邪魔だ。彼女が消えれば、私の敵は攻撃しても大丈夫だと思うだろう…それは大きな間違いなのだが。{/n}

languages.text: {n}“钢铁女士”手下的这位执法者，是这片甲板秩序与服从的象征。她……挡住了那些人的去路。一旦她消失了，我的敌人就会认为是时候发动攻击了……而那将会是个可怕的错误。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}“钢铁女士”手下的这位执法者，是这片甲板秩序与服从的象征。她……挡住了那些人的去路。一旦她消失了，我的敌人就会认为是时候发动攻击了……而那将会是个可怕的错误。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans ces quartiers, la prévôte qui répond à Maîtresse d'acier symbolise l'ordre et l'obéissance. Elle... est un obstacle. Quand elle disparaîtra, mes ennemis croiront qu'ils pourront frapper sans crainte... Une erreur qui leur coûtera cher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans ces quartiers, la prévôte qui répond à Maîtresse d'acier symbolise l'ordre et l'obéissance. Elle... est un obstacle. Quand elle disparaîtra, mes ennemis croiront qu'ils pourront frapper sans crainte... Une erreur qui leur coûtera cher.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çelikten Hanım'a hizmet eden bu infazcı, bu odalarda düzenin ve itaatkârlığın simgesi olarak görülüyor. O... Engel teşkil ediyor. Ortadan kaybolduğunda düşmanlarım, saldırıya geçme vakitlerinin geldiğine inanacak. Bu da onlara pahalıya patlayacak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This enforcer who answers to Steel Mistress is the symbol of order and obedience in these chambers. She is... standing in the way. When she disappears, my enemies will believe it is safe to strike... and that will be a costly mistake.{/n}
